## NFTDrop.getMetadata() method

Get the metadata for this program.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getMetadata(): Promise<NFTCollectionMetadata>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[NFTCollectionMetadata](./solana.nftcollectionmetadata.md)<!-- -->&gt;

program metadata

## Example


```jsx
const metadata = await program.getMetadata();
console.log(metadata.name);
```
